title: 1 person killed, 2 hospitalized after car crashes into Central Mass. home
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Local News One person died after they were dragged under the vehicle that crashed into the home, and two more people were injured.
One person was killed and two others were injured Wednesday afternoon after a car crashed into a garage in Leicester, according to authorities.

title: Former Emmanuel admissions director pleads guilty to attempted sex trafficking, cyberstalking
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Crime The former assistant admissions director pleaded guilty to trying to get several admitted or prospective students to have sex with him.
ShareSend this article to your social connections.
A former assistant admissions director at Emmanuel College pleaded guilty Wednesday to attempting to get an underage college applicant to have commercial sex with him, according to prosecutors.
